UniprotID	B7Z5P7
Accession	B7Z5P7
EntryName	B7Z5P7_HUMAN
ProteinName	Leupaxin
GeneName	LPXN
Length	366
Function	Transcriptional coactivator for androgen receptor (AR) and serum response factor (SRF). Contributes to the regulation of cell adhesion, spreading and cell migration and acts as a negative regulator in integrin-mediated cell adhesion events. Suppresses the integrin-induced tyrosine phosphorylation of paxillin (PXN).
Subcellular Location	Cell junction; Focal adhesion; Cytoplasm; Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Perinuclear region; Cell projection; Podosome; Cell membrane
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility
